scripts.build: npm run build -w @mariozechner/pi-tui && npm run build -w @mariozechner/pi-agent && npm run build -w @mariozechner/pi
scripts.check: biome check --write . && npm run check --workspaces && tsc --noEmit
scripts.prepublish:all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run check
scripts.publish:all: npm run prepublish:all && npm publish -ws --access public
scripts.publish:dry: npm run prepublish:all && npm publish -ws --access public --dry-run
